sentences.sContent: Knows(Those ) from south of the [ equator ] come to the United States during the northern winter .
sentences.sContent_eng: Knows(Those ) from south of the [ equator ] come to the United States during the northern winter .
sentences.sCn: 那些来自赤道以南的学生在北方的冬天来到美国。

remMethod.val: equ(相等的) + ator → 使(地球)平分 → 赤道

trans.tranOther: an imaginary line drawn around the middle of the Earth that is exactly the same distance from the North Pole and the South Pole
